chat.title: AI Consultation
chat.welcome: Hello! Describe your pet's symptoms and I'll help assess the situation.

high_risk_symptoms: Chest pain, difficulty breathing, severe bleeding, loss of consciousness
high_risk_advice: Seek immediate medical attention. Call emergency services or go to the nearest emergency room.
moderate_risk_symptoms: Fever, persistent cough, headache, fatigue, mild pain
moderate_risk_advice: Schedule a doctor's appointment within 24-48 hours. Monitor symptoms closely.
call_doctor_advice: Contact your healthcare provider for professional medical advice and proper diagnosis.
ai_doctor_guidelines: Our AI assistant follows these medical guidelines:
guideline_accuracy: Provide only evidence-based medical information from reputable sources
guideline_emergency: Immediately recognize emergency symptoms and advise seeking urgent care
guideline_clarity: Communicate in clear, understandable language without medical jargon
guideline_privacy: Maintain strict confidentiality of user health information
guideline_limitations: Clearly state limitations and always recommend consulting human doctors
